summary:
Standalone Retexture and tweaked version of Vaultman30's viking guards replacer.
Changes:
Solitud: Anglo-saxons
Stormcloaks: Wolves of Talos
descriptionHtml:
This is a [size=4][b]Standalone[/b][/size] replacer of all the guards in Skyrim except the imperials.(also replace solitud and stormcloak banners)
[u]Just download manually, copy the data folder into your Skyrim main directory and activate the .esp files in the NMM.[/u]

Load order: bottom of load order

[b][size=5]First of all[/size][/b], go to Vaultman30's mod and download his mod to be able to endorse his work, becouse its BADASS and he deserves all the heils.
Mod: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63346/?

What did i do:
-Edit Solitud guards's shields and banners
-Edit Stormcloaks, no more bears.....Wolves of Talos!!, edited shields, banners and ill try to get permision to upload the cloaks and capes retex.
-Changed the original Stormcloak outfit from Vaultman into a scandinavian chainmail (looks badass)
-Darkened the masked helmets
-upgraded the leather helmets textures
-changed the stormcloak generals outfit.
-Edited the simple hauberk mod and gave it a more de-saturated pattern and also tweaked the lamelar a bit.

To be made:
-get permision to upload the capes and cloaks, if done....i'll update this file so its all standalone.
-improve more tunic textures with nordic decoration.
-learn to  make content as awesome as the original one.

Thanks: 
Mayponce for the Stormcloak extension
Vaultman30 for the original mod

[size=5]Highly recommended:
[/size]This mod:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82743/?
author: Yoshimuji
